ðŸ“– Summary: FancyLock is a screen lock utility for Linux that enhances the user experience by displaying videos or images as lock screen backgrounds. It offers PAM authentication for secure login, supports multiple monitors, and provides customizable settings to tailor the lock screen to individual preferences. The utility aims to be both aesthetically pleasing and secure.
